thread.title: BRIEF-Apricus Biosciences Files For Offering Of 7.1 Mln Units

title: BRIEF-Apricus Biosciences Files For Offering Of 7.1 Mln Units

organizations.name: brief-apricus biosciences files for offering of 7.1 mln units reuters

text:
30 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Apricus Biosciences Files For Offering Of 7.1 Mln Units Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
March 28 (Reuters) - Apricus Biosciences Inc: 
* APRICUS BIOSCIENCES FILES FOR OFFERING OF 7.1 MILLION UNITS CONSISTING OF 1 SHARE OF COMMON STOCK & A WARRANT TO PURCHASE 0.5 OF A SHARE OF COMMON STOCK 
* APRICUS BIOSCIENCES INC SAYS CURRENTLY EXPECT THE PUBLIC OFFERING PRICE TO BE $0.50 PER UNIT - SEC FILING Source text: [ bit.ly/2E1mxEw ] Further company coverage:
